task.title: How To Subtract Using JPS Calculator
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions on making subtraction on JPS calculator.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what is subtraction.
taskbody.result: The results from the calculation is displayed.

example.p: You want to subtract 2 from 3.The equation will look like : 3-2=1. Enter 3. Press minus(-). Enter 2. Press equals(=).
The answer will appear on the screen.
